On Mon, 24 Feb 2003, Seairth Jacobs wrote:
> related question, what if that field were given and were valid ('q=foo'),
> but the querystring contained other fields as well?  Again, in my case, I am
> using 404 with the same arguement as above.

It would only make sense to do this if the other
fields were inapplicable.
For example, 'name=socrates' and 'name=socrates&mortal=yes'
shold work, but 'name=socrates&mortal=no' should
return 404.

There is something funny about FALSE being equal
to NotFound, but I'm not sure what it is.

-Alex-
